name: ChaO.S.
description:
(FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED)

This Game was made for Ludum Dare 48 with the Theme "Deeper and Deeper". 

Made together with the wonderful Will Andersen.

Sadly the build we managed to upload before the deadline was broken, so we were only able to upload a Post-Jam version about 10 minutes after. You can also download a Windows Version if the Web Player is broken for you. Sadly we can't support every Screen resolution right now, so let us know if you have issues.

Greetings Stranger,

I do not know how this Machine came into your possesion, however I am certain that it is a matter of fate. What is hidden in the depths of these files is of the utmost importance. I cannot in good conscience ask you to unearth the secrets that lie ahead, but I have no choice. I beg you. Venture forth, deeper and deeper.

Regretfully,

A hopeless soul.
